title: Calories in Reese's Peanut Butter Cups
meta_description: Learn calories in reeses with full nutrition for one standard cup: 110 kcal, macros, fats, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Reese's Peanut Butter Cups
assumptions: Standard 21g milk chocolate peanut butter cup from Hershey's, single serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, manufacturer, and exact recipe. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Reese's Peanut Butter Cup provides about 110 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.a: One standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup has 110 calories.

faqs.q: What is the protein in one Reese's cup?
faqs.a: About 3 g of protein per standard cup.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in Reese's?
faqs.a: 10 g of total sugars per cup, mostly added.
Yes, 9 g total fat per cup, with 3.5 g saturated.
Approximately 220 kcal for two standard cups.
